description: Are you seeking treatment for improved sexual activity?
Have you had you vital tested by medical practitioner in the last 3 years? This include weight blood pressure and heart rate?
What is your blood pressure on an average day (even when taking medication)?

options.description: Normal ( less than 120 systolic and less than 80 diastolic )
Elevated (120 to 129 systolic and less than 80 diastolic )
Uncontrolled (above 160 systolic OR higher than 100 diastolic )

description: List medication allergies.
List all prescription medications which you take. (Disclaimer: It is very important that you list the name of each medication so your physician can make sure there will not be any drug interactions).
Are you currently taking any medications for erectile dysfunction or pulmonary hypertension? (Example: tadalafil, Cialis, sildenafil, Viagra, Revatio, Levitra)
What are those medication for ED you are taking
Please list all other medical problems
Have you ever had a cardiac attack? cardiac surgery?
Do you have any heart/cardiac conditions? Arrhythmias?
Please Explain, your heart/cardiac conditions.
Do you have any heart/cardiac conditions? Arrhythmias?

options.description: Nitroglycerin in any form - as a spray, tablet, patch or ointment. Deponit, Minitran, Nitrek, Nitro-Bid, Nircot, Nitrodisc, Niro-Dur, Nitrograd, Nitroglyn, Nitro!, Nitrolingua, Nitrolingual, NitroMist, Nitrong, Nitronol, -Nitro-Par, Nitroquick, Nitrostat, Nitrotab, Nitro-Time, Transdermal-Nitro, Medicine containing nitrates
Isosorbide Mononitrate or Isosorbide Dinitrate (Dilatrate, Dilatrate-SR, Imdur, Ismo, Isordil, Monoket, Sorbitrate)
Adempas (Riociquat), which is used to treat pulmonary hypertension

description: Are you currently using any of the following recreational drugs?
Select any of the following medical issues that apply?

options.description: I have been told that I am not healthy enough to have sex
Within the last year I have experienced chest pain AND/OR significant shortness of breath while undergoing exercise
I have experienced unexplained blurry vision or headaches
I am unable to walk 1 mile on a flat surface within 20 minutes
I have been diagnosed with low blood pressure

description: Over the past 6 months, how do you rate your confidence that you could keep an erection?
Over the past 6 months, when you had erections with sexual stimulation, how often were your erections hard enough for penetration (entering your partner)?
Over the past 6 months, during sexual intercourse, how difficult was it to maintain your erection to completion of intercourse?
Over the past 6 months, when you attempted sexual intercourse, how often was it satisfactory for you?
Is there anything else you would like to tell the doctor?
Please write down additional notes
